name: Toon Tanks (itch) (Reual Nathan Onyrian)
description:
A simple demo, when the player takes control of a tank in order to destroy the enemy turrets. Short and silly game, with basic funcionalities coded.

Move the tank with WASD, aim with the mouse, and shoot with the LMB. You will have to restart the app when you get hit twice, as there is no timer for resetting.
